name: D & Dice
description:
Destroy your enemies using powerful dice in tactical D&D-themed battles!  Time your attacks and plan your movements wisely to crush your foes. Features:

• Dice that can smash and explode enemies.

• A handful of dungeons with unique mechanics.

• A variety of different enemy types inspired by D&D classes.

Made in under 48h for GMTKJam 2022 - Roll of the Dice.
